channel.title: I need help with lots of things///++nice poll
channel.description:
Ok first is first, what is the code for spawning a dragon full helmet? next, how do we know the case for making a portal?(like if i made a port, how do i know the case number)(how do I make 2 portals in the same area) after that, can directions of npcs be changed? Last but not least, how do i make a specials bar for darkbow, and also add the special animations? _*~_~*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*~_*
Ok , if you can answer , Thank You. If you cannot ,please do not but me.

[quote=“randyplp, post:6, topic:152352”]I am not lazy, so-called genius…i cant get the specials bar, i can do the special without the bar, sheesh…
And yet i keep repeating , does anyone know how to add spec bar without getting errors on compilers?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 17, 2007, 06:20:22 PM[/size][hr]Anyone know the code for rune boots ?, or anything stronger, trying to improve starters look[/quote]Don’t Double post.
And look in mopar lazy

item.title: I need help with lots of things///++nice poll
item.dc:creator: @big_b140 big b140
item.description:
@big_b140 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } }
replace your pickup command with that if you havent already and the id for d full helm is 11824 and i cant help with the other thing lol soz

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with lots of things///++nice poll
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

Portal case is the portal ID. Change NPCs in Autospawn.cfg

Dragon full helm is on silabs client, and you need a new pickup command.

Read full topic
